editor.increaseIndentPattern:
(?x)
# From language-html
<(?!\?|(?:area|base|br|col|frame|hr|html|img|input|link|meta|param)\b|[^>]*/>)
([-_\.A-Za-z0-9]+)(?=\s|>)\b[^>]*>(?!.*</\1>)
|<!--(?!.*-->)
|<\?php.+?\b(if|else(?:if)?|for(?:each)?|while)\b.*:(?!.*end\2)
|\{[^}"']*$
# Blade specific
|(?<![A-Za-z0-9_@])
 @
 (?:
  (?i)auth
 |(?i)can
 |(?i)canany
 |(?i)cannot
 |(?i)component
 |(?i)componentfirst
 |(?i)else
 |(?i)elsecan
 |(?i)elsecanany
 |(?i)elsecannot
 |(?i)elseif
 |(?i)empty
 |(?i)error
 |(?i)for
 |(?i)foreach
 |(?i)forelse
 |(?i)guest
 |(?i)hasSection
 |(?i)if
 |(?i)isset
 |(?i)slot
 |(?i)switch
 |(?i)unless
 |verbatim
 |(?i)while
 )
 \b
|(?<![A-Za-z0-9_@])
 @(?i:(php|lang))\b
 (?! # Not followed by
  [\t ]*\( # Single line expression
 |.*(?<![A-Za-z0-9_@])@(?i:end\3)\b # @end-directive of the same name on same line
 )
|(?<![A-Za-z0-9_@])
 @(?i:section|prepend|push)\b
 (?! # Not followed by
  [\t ]*\([ ]*(?:"[^"]*"|'[^']*')[ ]*, # Comma after string argument
 )
